description: This process allows users to verify the current version of the Microsoft Edge browser to ensure it is updated and secure against the CVE-2023-6350 vulnerability. To perform this check, navigate to the top right corner of the Edge window and click on the three dots. From there, select 'Help and feedback' and then click 'About Microsoft Edge' to view version information. It is crucial to keep the browser updated, especially to patch security vulnerabilities that may affect system integrity. Regularly checking the browser version can aid in maintaining security best practices within your organization.
